name: Hexty - Sweet Word Search
description:
Love word search and sweet treats? We have something to match both passions! Enter the world of bees, hives, and honey! The cute bear needs your help to get his tasty treats. Search honeycombs for words, connect letters together, drop in every day to get yummy honey rewards. Train your brain, test your vocabulary, and have the sweetest fun!

Join the bear in his delicious adventure around the world of honey-made letters and words. Up for a sweet word challenge?

FEATURES

- The bear & honey word search. Simple and fun for everyone.
- Hundreds of words to be found.
- Get the bees out of the hive to get daily rewards.
- Cartoon cute, colorful, funny.
- Chance your luck spinning slots.
- Complete levels to get bees and honey.
- Visit the buzzy Bee Shop to get more bees and move on faster.
- Can’t find a word? No sweat! Use smart hints.
- An awesome way of killing time wherever you are.
- Perfect for teamwork party or family entertainment.
- Delicious brain teaser. Learn new words every day.
- New day - new challenge. From easy to super hard!
- Share your achievements with friends.

Hexty is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

We’d love to hear from you! Share your feedback with us: support@exosmart.uk.com
